student.name: Agnieszka Joanna Zimolag
student.bio: 2010-2014 Bachelor of Graphic Design, Gerrit Rietveld Academie, Amsterdam The Netherlands

entries.title: The Shelter
entries.excerpt: Why is it so difficult to find a place to live in big cities like Paris, London or Amsterdam? Why are the prices so high? How is it possible that with so many empty places, so many people have no place to live?

entries.title: Digital detox bath
entries.excerpt: Digital detox bath” is an installation about a different approach to what material means…
